name: BombySitter
description: A grappling game inspired by my kids toy mess. It's 1 part hide and seek, 1 part crazy taxi, and 1 part ATOT. If you play it and can beat my high score of 11 dm me a screenshot! Bombysitter is a small project I made to get a break from a bigger one. A lot of this was slapped together to be completed quickly.
